"Ran": "To reiterate what has been said earlier, the Vanford Laboratory Ruins is a more dangerous place than Mt. Magnus."
"The DOLLS encountered there are quite uncommon in other regions. As such, only ARKS with adequate Power Level are permitted entry."
"To ensure that you are capable of fighting the enemies at the Laboratory, please take measures to strengthen your equipment as well as your abilities."
"In addition, training in the Cocoons to acquire a diverse set of skills also contributes to your Power Level."
"Please be at your peak performance to approach the situation. Take care of yourself, and be well."
